wishwaya ma keren yam pamanakata aath wuna nam ee 3 wasaredi pamani.pera panthiwala mithuran nathi wunath ma sathutin panthibhara guruthumiya wu ashoka gurumaniyan yatathe adhyapanaya labu wakawanuwayi ee.ema panthiya gana mata mathakayak aththe poth kiyawimata ma thadinma abbahi wu kalaya lesayi.ema nisa hoda rachana liyanawa kiya guruthumiyagen nithara prashansa labu bawath mage mathakaye atha.eyin epitata giya nan ee panthiye eha paththe wu midula athugama pamanaki.ema midula athugama ape panthiye lamunta bharawa thibu rajakariyak wuwath eya sidu kala nan ee ma pamani.ma eya patan gaththeth joliyata unath pasu kalinawa eyata ma abbahi wu bawak mata sihikala hakiya.

abhimanawath ithihasayaka urumaya samastha lokayatama kiyapana me aithihasika purawaraya sanskruthika agaya madakudu nowenas wana paridi anagathayata aaraksha karannata kandurata udanaya wada piliwela yatathe katayuthu aarambha kara atha.wasara 700 ka asgiriya wiharasthanaye ithihasa kathawa thawath siyawas gananawak pura nowenaswa pawathwagena yama rajayeth maha janathawageth yuthukamaki.samastha lanka shasanarakshaka mandalaye kruthyadhikari mandala anushasaka,asgiri maha wihariya karakasangha sabhika shasthrapathi,madagama dhammananda himianubudu mihindu himiyan meratata budu dahama handunwadimath samanga ee kerehi pahadunu dewanampiyathissa raju aritta kumaru pradhana kuladaruwan sasungatha karawa sambuddha shasanaye abhiwruddhiya athi kaleya.
